jQuery(this).contents().find('*').html();var is_postback = contents.indexOf('GF_AJAX_POSTBACK') >= 0;if(!is_postback){return;}var form_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_wrapper_1');var is_confirmation = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_confirmation_wrapper_1').length > 0;var is_redirect = contents.indexOf('gformRedirect(){') >= 0;var is_form = form_content.length > 0 && ! is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;var mt = parseInt(jQuery('html').css('margin-top'), 10) + parseInt(jQuery('body').css('margin-top'), 10) + 100;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */  }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_1').val();gformInitSpinner( 1, '../wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.svg', true );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [1, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_1'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('.GF_AJAX_POSTBACK').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').replaceWith(confirmation_content);jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [1]);window['gf_submitting_1'] = false;wp.a11y.speak(jQuery('#gform_confirmation_message_1').text());}else{jQuery('#gform_1').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger("gform_pre_post_render", [{ formId: "1", currentPage: "current_page", abort: function() { this.preventDefault(); } }]);        if (event && event.defaultPrevented) {                return;        }        const gformWrapperDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_wrapper_1" );        if ( gformWrapperDiv ) {            const visibilitySpan = document.createElement( "span" );            visibilitySpan.id = "gform_visibility_test_1";            gformWrapperDiv.insertAdjacentElement( "afterend", visibilitySpan );        }        const visibilityTestDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_visibility_test_1" );        let postRenderFired = false;        function triggerPostRender() {            if ( postRenderFired ) {                return;            }            postRenderFired = true;            gform.core.triggerPostRenderEvents( 1, current_page );            if ( visibilityTestDiv ) {                visibilityTestDiv.parentNode.removeChild( visibilityTestDiv );            }        }        function debounce( func, wait, immediate ) {            var timeout;            return function() {                var context = this, args = arguments;                var later = function() {                    timeout = null;                    if ( !immediate ) func.apply( context, args );                };                var callNow = immediate && !timeout;                clearTimeout( timeout );                timeout = setTimeout( later, wait );                if ( callNow ) func.apply( context, args );            };        }        const debouncedTriggerPostRender = debounce( function() {            triggerPostRender();        }, 200 );        if ( visibilityTestDiv && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent === null ) {            const observer = new MutationObserver( ( mutations ) => {                mutations.forEach( ( mutation ) => {                    if ( mutation.type === 'attributes' && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent !== null ) {                        debouncedTriggerPostRender();                        observer.disconnect();                    }                });            });            observer.observe( document.body, {                attributes: true,                childList: false,                subtree: true,                attributeFilter: [ 'style', 'class' ],            });        } else {            triggerPostRender();        }    } );} );

<script type="speculationrules">
{"prefetch":[{"source":"document","where":{"and":[{"href_matches":"\/*"},{"not":{"href_matches":["\/wp-*.php","\/wp-admin\/*","\/wp-content\/uploads\/*","\/wp-content\/*","\/wp-content\/plugins\/*","\/wp-content\/themes\/hello-theme-child-master\/*","\/wp-content\/themes\/hello-elementor\/*","\/*\\?(.+)"]}},{"not":{"selector_matches":"a[rel~=\"nofollow\"]"}},{"not":{"selector_matches":".no-prefetch, .no-prefetch a"}}]},"eagerness":"conservative"}]}
</script>
			<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

<script id="elementor-frontend-js-after">
window.scope_array = [];
								window.backend = 0;
								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");
										}else{
											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;

											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});

								// Added both `document` and `window` event listeners to address issues where some users faced problems with the `document` event not triggering as expected.
								// Define cachedScript globally to avoid redefining it.

								jQuery.cachedScript = function(url, options) {
									options = jQuery.extend(options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									return jQuery.ajax(options); // Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks
								};

								let uael_particle_loaded = false; //flag to prevent multiple script loads.

								jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
										loadParticleScript();
								});

								jQuery( window ).one( "elementor/frontend/init", () => {
								 	if (!uael_particle_loaded) {
										loadParticleScript();
									}
								});
								
								function loadParticleScript(){
								 	// Use jQuery to check for the presence of the element
									if (jQuery(".uael-particle-yes").length < 1) {
										return;
									}
									
									uael_particle_loaded = true;
									var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
									// Call the cachedScript function
									jQuery.cachedScript(uael_url);
								}

<script>
gform.initializeOnLoaded( function() {jQuery(document).trigger("gform_pre_post_render", [{ formId: "1", currentPage: "1", abort: function() { this.preventDefault(); } }]);        if (event && event.defaultPrevented) {                return;        }        const gformWrapperDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_wrapper_1" );        if ( gformWrapperDiv ) {            const visibilitySpan = document.createElement( "span" );            visibilitySpan.id = "gform_visibility_test_1";            gformWrapperDiv.insertAdjacentElement( "afterend", visibilitySpan );        }        const visibilityTestDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_visibility_test_1" );        let postRenderFired = false;        function triggerPostRender() {            if ( postRenderFired ) {                return;            }            postRenderFired = true;            gform.core.triggerPostRenderEvents( 1, 1 );            if ( visibilityTestDiv ) {                visibilityTestDiv.parentNode.removeChild( visibilityTestDiv );            }        }        function debounce( func, wait, immediate ) {            var timeout;            return function() {                var context = this, args = arguments;                var later = function() {                    timeout = null;                    if ( !immediate ) func.apply( context, args );                };                var callNow = immediate && !timeout;                clearTimeout( timeout );                timeout = setTimeout( later, wait );                if ( callNow ) func.apply( context, args );            };        }        const debouncedTriggerPostRender = debounce( function() {            triggerPostRender();        }, 200 );        if ( visibilityTestDiv && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent === null ) {            const observer = new MutationObserver( ( mutations ) => {                mutations.forEach( ( mutation ) => {                    if ( mutation.type === 'attributes' && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent !== null ) {                        debouncedTriggerPostRender();                        observer.disconnect();                    }                });            });            observer.observe( document.body, {                attributes: true,                childList: false,                subtree: true,                attributeFilter: [ 'style', 'class' ],            });        } else {            triggerPostRender();        }    } );
</script>

	<item>
		<title>Ribbon Cutting Midway Elementary</title>
		<link>https://barrettforstatehouse.com/ribbon-cutting-midway-elementary/</link>
		
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[i360admin]]></dc:creator>
		<pubDate>Tue, 23 Jul 2024 18:43:39 +0000</pubDate>
				<category><![CDATA[General]]></category>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://barrettforstatehouse.com/?p=5077</guid>

					<description><![CDATA[<p>I had the privilege of attending the ribbon-cutting ceremony at Midway Elementary yesterday. Our community in Forsyth always supports education, as seen by the large number of parents and students in attendance at this ribbon-cutting ceremony. The Education Special Purpose Local Option Sales Tax (E-SPLOST) made the construction of this new school possible. I take [&#8230;]</p>
<p>The post <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/ribbon-cutting-midway-elementary/">Ribbon Cutting Midway Elementary</a> appeared first on <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com">Carter Barrett - Georgia House Senate</a>.</p>
]]></description>
										<content:encoded><![CDATA[		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="5077" class="elementor elementor-5077" data-elementor-post-type="post">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1984fad e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="1984fad" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-73b6672 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="73b6672" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0f324d3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="0f324d3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>I had the privilege of attending the ribbon-cutting ceremony at Midway Elementary yesterday. Our community in Forsyth always supports education, as seen by the large number of parents and students in attendance at this ribbon-cutting ceremony. The Education Special Purpose Local Option Sales Tax (E-SPLOST) made the construction of this new school possible. I take pride in having chaired the E-SPLOST committee in 2017 prior to my involvement in politics, which played a crucial role in funding this school. Thanks to the unwavering support from our community, we now have this new school without incurring any debt. With our exceptional school system and this new facility, Forsyth is well-positioned to provide outstanding education for our youth as our community continues to grow.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-be8e469 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="be8e469" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-5d629a0 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="5d629a0" data-element_type="container">

										<content:encoded><![CDATA[		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="5020" class="elementor elementor-5020" data-elementor-post-type="post">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1984fad e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="1984fad" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-73b6672 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="73b6672" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0f324d3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="0f324d3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>The Legislative delegation of Forsyth has successfully passed HB 717. This bill aims to address the issue of increasing property taxes for residents. Vote YES on this ballot referendum in November.</p><p>If this referendum is approved, it will limit how much the taxable value of a home would increase, year after year, to no more than four percent for any homeowner who applies for and receives the homestead exemption.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-be8e469 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="be8e469" data-element_type="container">

		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-5d629a0 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="5d629a0" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-18f2b02 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="18f2b02" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">

		<title>Rep. Carter Barrett Named as Georgia Council on Aging’s 2023 Legislator of The Year</title>
		<link>https://barrettforstatehouse.com/rep-carter-barrett-named-as-georgia-council-on-agings-2023-legislator-of-the-year/</link>

		<pubDate>Tue, 23 Jul 2024 17:26:35 +0000</pubDate>
				<category><![CDATA[General]]></category>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://barrettforstatehouse.com/?p=5002</guid>

					<description><![CDATA[<p>Georgia Council on Aging I received the “Legislator of the Year” award from the Georgia Council on Aging. I was proud to work on SB 84, which provides protective measures to prevent the financial exploitation of elderly citizens in Georgia. “ I am honored and humbled that the GCOA selected me for this award during [&#8230;]</p>
<p>The post <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/rep-carter-barrett-named-as-georgia-council-on-agings-2023-legislator-of-the-year/">Rep. Carter Barrett Named as Georgia Council on Aging’s 2023 Legislator of The Year</a> appeared first on <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com">Carter Barrett - Georgia House Senate</a>.</p>
]]></description>
										<content:encoded><![CDATA[		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="5002" class="elementor elementor-5002" data-elementor-post-type="post">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1984fad e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="1984fad" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-73b6672 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="73b6672" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-aac241c e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="aac241c" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-46e33f8 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="46e33f8" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1d68c06 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="1d68c06" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Georgia Council on Aging</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0f324d3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="0f324d3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>I received the “Legislator of the Year” award from the Georgia Council on Aging. I was proud to work on SB 84, which provides protective measures to prevent the financial exploitation of elderly citizens in Georgia.</p><p>“ I am honored and humbled that the GCOA selected me for this award during my first legislative session,” said Rep. Barrett. “This award serves as a reminder of the importance of our collective responsibility to prioritize and address the needs of our aging population. As a legislator, I am committed to working closely with organizations to develop and implement policies that safeguard the rights, health, and dignity of our senior residents.”</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-71b2d73 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="71b2d73" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-39032de elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="39032de" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">

				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-b65a060 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="b65a060" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-925077b e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="925077b" data-element_type="container">

																<a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Council-on-Aging-Legislator-of-the-Year-PR-page-1-for-news-page.jpg" data-elementor-open-lightbox="yes" data-elementor-lightbox-title="Council on Aging Legislator of the Year PR page 1 for news page" data-e-action-hash="#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dlightbox%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6NTAwNCwidXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6XC9cL2JhcnJldHRmb3JzdGF0ZWhvdXNlLmNvbVwvd3AtY29udGVudFwvdXBsb2Fkc1wvMjAyNFwvMDdcL0NvdW5jaWwtb24tQWdpbmctTGVnaXNsYXRvci1vZi10aGUtWWVhci1QUi1wYWdlLTEtZm9yLW5ld3MtcGFnZS5qcGcifQ%3D%3D">

				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-ad63920 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="ad63920" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3ef284b elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="3ef284b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
																<a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Council-on-Aging-Legislator-of-the-Year-PR-for-news-page.jpg" data-elementor-open-lightbox="yes" data-elementor-lightbox-title="Council on Aging Legislator of the Year PR for news page" data-e-action-hash="#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dlightbox%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6NTAwMywidXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6XC9cL2JhcnJldHRmb3JzdGF0ZWhvdXNlLmNvbVwvd3AtY29udGVudFwvdXBsb2Fkc1wvMjAyNFwvMDdcL0NvdW5jaWwtb24tQWdpbmctTGVnaXNsYXRvci1vZi10aGUtWWVhci1QUi1mb3ItbmV3cy1wYWdlLmpwZyJ9">
							<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="520" height="634" src="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Council-on-Aging-Legislator-of-the-Year-PR-for-news-page.jpg" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-5003" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Council-on-Aging-Legislator-of-the-Year-PR-for-news-page.jpg 520w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Council-on-Aging-Legislator-of-the-Year-PR-for-news-page-246x300.jpg 246w" sizes="(max-width: 520px) 100vw, 520px" />								</a>
															</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<p>The post <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/rep-carter-barrett-named-as-georgia-council-on-agings-2023-legislator-of-the-year/">Rep. Carter Barrett Named as Georgia Council on Aging’s 2023 Legislator of The Year</a> appeared first on <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com">Carter Barrett - Georgia House Senate</a>.</p>
]]></content:encoded>
					
		
		
			</item>
		<item>
		<title>Vice-Chair of the Committee on Dual Enrollment and Tuition Equalization Grants</title>
		<link>https://barrettforstatehouse.com/vice-chair-of-the-committee-on-dual-enrollment-and-tuition-equalization-grants/</link>
		
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[i360admin]]></dc:creator>
		<pubDate>Tue, 23 Jul 2024 14:51:27 +0000</pubDate>
				<category><![CDATA[General]]></category>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://barrettforstatehouse.com/?p=4989</guid>

					<description><![CDATA[<p>I am honored to have been appointed as the Vice-Chairman of the Committee on Dual Enrollment and Tuition Equalization Grants. Forsyth County has a thriving dual enrollment community, and I believe that more families in Forsyth County should consider taking advantage of this opportunity for their high school-aged children. In the current economic climate, this [&#8230;]</p>
<p>The post <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/vice-chair-of-the-committee-on-dual-enrollment-and-tuition-equalization-grants/">Vice-Chair of the Committee on Dual Enrollment and Tuition Equalization Grants</a> appeared first on <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com">Carter Barrett - Georgia House Senate</a>.</p>
]]></description>
										<content:encoded><![CDATA[		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="4989" class="elementor elementor-4989" data-elementor-post-type="post">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-6760256 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="6760256" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-f40208f e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="f40208f" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6d85e14 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="6d85e14" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>I am honored to have been appointed as the Vice-Chairman of the Committee on Dual Enrollment and Tuition Equalization Grants. Forsyth County has a thriving dual enrollment community, and I believe that more families in Forsyth County should consider taking advantage of this opportunity for their high school-aged children. In the current economic climate, this program is of great benefit to Georgia families. My daughter was able to earn her associate degree before graduating from high school, and she gained valuable real-world work experience as a tutor at UNG, which exposed her to the wide range of offerings at Lanier Technical College. I am confident that this experience also helped her gain admission to Georgia Tech. Furthermore, having a head start on her college curriculum has allowed her to make the most of her college experience with reduced stress.</p><p>Most importantly, Dual Enrollment provided her with early exposure to the university and technical college experience while still being under the watchful eye of her parents at home. This program is a fantastic offering by our great state. I encourage you to learn more about the opportunities available for your high school students.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-69067f0 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="69067f0" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1d9c8e1 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="1d9c8e1" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-153b848 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="153b848" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
																<a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Press-Release-Dual-Enrollment-for-news-section.jpg" data-elementor-open-lightbox="yes" data-elementor-lightbox-title="Press Release Dual Enrollment for news section" data-e-action-hash="#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dlightbox%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6NDk5MCwidXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6XC9cL2JhcnJldHRmb3JzdGF0ZWhvdXNlLmNvbVwvd3AtY29udGVudFwvdXBsb2Fkc1wvMjAyNFwvMDdcL1ByZXNzLVJlbGVhc2UtRHVhbC1FbnJvbGxtZW50LWZvci1uZXdzLXNlY3Rpb24uanBnIn0%3D">
							<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="680" height="809" src="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Press-Release-Dual-Enrollment-for-news-section.jpg" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-4990" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Press-Release-Dual-Enrollment-for-news-section.jpg 680w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Press-Release-Dual-Enrollment-for-news-section-252x300.jpg 252w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Press-Release-Dual-Enrollment-for-news-section-600x714.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 680px) 100vw, 680px" />								</a>
															</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-b880899 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="b880899" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-285ca15 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="285ca15" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
																<a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/press-release-dual-enrollment-2-for-news-section.jpg" data-elementor-open-lightbox="yes" data-elementor-lightbox-title="press release dual enrollment 2 for news section" data-e-action-hash="#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dlightbox%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6NDk5MSwidXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6XC9cL2JhcnJldHRmb3JzdGF0ZWhvdXNlLmNvbVwvd3AtY29udGVudFwvdXBsb2Fkc1wvMjAyNFwvMDdcL3ByZXNzLXJlbGVhc2UtZHVhbC1lbnJvbGxtZW50LTItZm9yLW5ld3Mtc2VjdGlvbi5qcGcifQ%3D%3D">
							<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="686" height="673" src="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/press-release-dual-enrollment-2-for-news-section.jpg" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-4991" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/press-release-dual-enrollment-2-for-news-section.jpg 686w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/press-release-dual-enrollment-2-for-news-section-300x294.jpg 300w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/press-release-dual-enrollment-2-for-news-section-600x589.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 686px) 100vw, 686px" />								</a>

		<item>
		<title>HB 1053 Central Bank Digital Currency Signed Into Law</title>
		<link>https://barrettforstatehouse.com/hb-1053-central-bank-digital-currency-signed-into-law/</link>
		
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[i360admin]]></dc:creator>
		<pubDate>Fri, 19 Jul 2024 17:52:56 +0000</pubDate>
				<category><![CDATA[General]]></category>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://barrettforstatehouse.com/?p=5029</guid>

					<description><![CDATA[<p>Americans should have a fundamental right to privacy! I am proud to have authored HB1053 this year and am so pleased Governor Kemp signed it into law this week.  This legislation pushes back on the Federal Reserve’s plan to issue a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC), which would be a total invasion of privacy for [&#8230;]</p>
<p>The post <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/hb-1053-central-bank-digital-currency-signed-into-law/">HB 1053 Central Bank Digital Currency Signed Into Law</a> appeared first on <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com">Carter Barrett - Georgia House Senate</a>.</p>
]]></description>
										<content:encoded><![CDATA[		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="5029" class="elementor elementor-5029" data-elementor-post-type="post">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1984fad e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="1984fad" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-73b6672 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="73b6672" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-cb298df e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="cb298df" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-65b1386 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="65b1386" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-2643a23 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="2643a23" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-39ec20e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="39ec20e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Americans should have a fundamental right to privacy!</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0f324d3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="0f324d3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>I am proud to have authored HB1053 this year and am so pleased Governor Kemp signed it into law this week.  This legislation pushes back on the Federal Reserve’s plan to issue a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC), which would be a total invasion of privacy for Americans and would undermine our banks and credit unions.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-dfef6e3 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="dfef6e3" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-61f4c69 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="61f4c69" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
																<a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB1053SignedIntoLaw.png" data-elementor-open-lightbox="yes" data-elementor-lightbox-title="HB1053SignedIntoLaw" data-e-action-hash="#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dlightbox%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6NTMxNCwidXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6XC9cL2JhcnJldHRmb3JzdGF0ZWhvdXNlLmNvbVwvd3AtY29udGVudFwvdXBsb2Fkc1wvMjAyNFwvMDdcL0hCMTA1M1NpZ25lZEludG9MYXcucG5nIn0%3D">
							<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="558" height="465" src="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB1053SignedIntoLaw.png" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-5314" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB1053SignedIntoLaw.png 558w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB1053SignedIntoLaw-300x250.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 558px) 100vw, 558px" />								</a>
															</div>
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-9679d68 e-grid e-con-full e-con e-child" data-id="9679d68" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-9fc7c0b elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="9fc7c0b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
												<figure class="wp-caption">
										<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="800" height="600" src="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-1024x768.jpeg" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-5032" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-1024x768.jpeg 1024w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-300x225.jpeg 300w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-768x576.jpeg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-1536x1152.jpeg 1536w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-2048x1536.jpeg 2048w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/HB-1053-Central-Bank-Digital-Currency-heads-to-the-Governors-Desk-600x450.jpeg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 800px) 100vw, 800px" />											<figcaption class="widget-image-caption wp-caption-text">Final Passage of HB 1053 Heading to Governor's desk</figcaption>
										</figure>
									</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6e44d5b elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="6e44d5b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>With this legislation, Georgia will not participate in any CBDC pilot programs, and if the Fed does go forward, Georgia governmental agencies will not accept payment in this form of currency.</p><p>A CBDC is a form of digital money issued by a central bank that would eventually replace the dollars in your wallet.  The government would know every dollar you spent and where you were when you spent it.   That’s just creepy!</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-810e7e3 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="810e7e3" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-bdc0c18 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="bdc0c18" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>With this legislation, Georgia will not participate in any CBDC pilot programs, and if the Fed does go forward, Georgia governmental agencies will not accept payment in this form of currency.</p><p>A CBDC is a form of digital money issued by a central bank that would eventually replace the dollars in your wallet.  The government would know every dollar you spent and where you were when you spent it.   That’s just creepy!</p><p>This would enable the government to:</p><ul><li>Monitor your transactions.</li><li>Build a profile of your habits and behavior.</li><li>And even manipulate that money to allow or disallow certain transactions, freeze your accounts, and seize your assets.</li></ul><p>I would especially like to thank the many Georgians who supported this bi-partisan bill with emails and phone calls to the Capitol; the House co-sponsors of this bill (Noel Williams, <a href="https://www.facebook.com/holt.persinger?__cft__%5B0%5D=AZVOHMjwU1fZRHt1bGJWrv6si8B0Pap0Ou6VPH1mdiYcauAhFBc7FZahOc2-v0MTjn0VLL5vg5hS5yDJZdWydqiHiG29i1HWnNdmT98n79pPk1CcqGGqJFiNiYxOV4Srd03FQuT4sxtcOp7KWx6g44LJuStQTVL38-V0Buz7IIxTGPzmWVqNuiTl04hUBfvkQwclBNxRZ4MAR6uwSomJUDeu&amp;__tn__=-%5DK-R">Holt Persinger</a>, <a href="https://www.facebook.com/votedavidclark?__cft__%5B0%5D=AZVOHMjwU1fZRHt1bGJWrv6si8B0Pap0Ou6VPH1mdiYcauAhFBc7FZahOc2-v0MTjn0VLL5vg5hS5yDJZdWydqiHiG29i1HWnNdmT98n79pPk1CcqGGqJFiNiYxOV4Srd03FQuT4sxtcOp7KWx6g44LJuStQTVL38-V0Buz7IIxTGPzmWVqNuiTl04hUBfvkQwclBNxRZ4MAR6uwSomJUDeu&amp;__tn__=-%5DK-R">David Clark</a>, Trey Kelley, and <a href="https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61551002624092&amp;__cft__%5B0%5D=AZVOHMjwU1fZRHt1bGJWrv6si8B0Pap0Ou6VPH1mdiYcauAhFBc7FZahOc2-v0MTjn0VLL5vg5hS5yDJZdWydqiHiG29i1HWnNdmT98n79pPk1CcqGGqJFiNiYxOV4Srd03FQuT4sxtcOp7KWx6g44LJuStQTVL38-V0Buz7IIxTGPzmWVqNuiTl04hUBfvkQwclBNxRZ4MAR6uwSomJUDeu&amp;__tn__=-%5DK-R">Johnny Chastain</a>); <a href="https://www.facebook.com/dolezalforsenate?__cft__%5B0%5D=AZVOHMjwU1fZRHt1bGJWrv6si8B0Pap0Ou6VPH1mdiYcauAhFBc7FZahOc2-v0MTjn0VLL5vg5hS5yDJZdWydqiHiG29i1HWnNdmT98n79pPk1CcqGGqJFiNiYxOV4Srd03FQuT4sxtcOp7KWx6g44LJuStQTVL38-V0Buz7IIxTGPzmWVqNuiTl04hUBfvkQwclBNxRZ4MAR6uwSomJUDeu&amp;__tn__=-%5DK-R">Senator Greg Dolezal</a> for sponsoring this in the Senate and getting it approved in that body; and the excellent input and advocacy of organizations like Heritage Action; Frontline Policy Action, and Georgia Faith and Freedom.</p>								</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<p>The post <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/hb-1053-central-bank-digital-currency-signed-into-law/">HB 1053 Central Bank Digital Currency Signed Into Law</a> appeared first on <a href="https://barrettforstatehouse.com">Carter Barrett - Georgia House Senate</a>.</p>
]]></content:encoded>

				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-8e090b3 elementor-align-right elementor-widget elementor-widget-button" data-id="8e090b3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="button.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<div class="elementor-button-wrapper">
					<a class="elementor-button elementor-button-link elementor-size-sm" href="https://secure.winred.com/carter-barrett-for-state-house/home-donate" target="_blank">
						<span class="elementor-button-content-wrapper">
									<span class="elementor-button-text">Donate</span>

					</a>

{"prefetch":[{"source":"document","where":{"and":[{"href_matches":"\/*"},{"not":{"href_matches":["\/wp-*.php","\/wp-admin\/*","\/wp-content\/uploads\/*","\/wp-content\/*","\/wp-content\/plugins\/*","\/wp-content\/themes\/hello-theme-child-master\/*","\/wp-content\/themes\/hello-elementor\/*","\/*\\?(.+)"]}},{"not":{"selector_matches":"a[rel~=\"nofollow\"]"}},{"not":{"selector_matches":".no-prefetch, .no-prefetch a"}}]},"eagerness":"conservative"}]}

			<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

<script id="elementor-frontend-js-after">
window.scope_array = [];
								window.backend = 0;
								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");
										}else{
											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;

											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});

								// Added both `document` and `window` event listeners to address issues where some users faced problems with the `document` event not triggering as expected.
								// Define cachedScript globally to avoid redefining it.

								jQuery.cachedScript = function(url, options) {
									options = jQuery.extend(options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									return jQuery.ajax(options); // Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks
								};

								let uael_particle_loaded = false; //flag to prevent multiple script loads.

								jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
										loadParticleScript();
								});

								jQuery( window ).one( "elementor/frontend/init", () => {
								 	if (!uael_particle_loaded) {
										loadParticleScript();
									}
								});
								
								function loadParticleScript(){
								 	// Use jQuery to check for the presence of the element
									if (jQuery(".uael-particle-yes").length < 1) {
										return;
									}
									
									uael_particle_loaded = true;
									var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
									// Call the cachedScript function
									jQuery.cachedScript(uael_url);
								}

				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">34 Years of Unwavering Dedication to Public Service, Committed to Supporting Forsyth</h2>				</div>

		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-c9f5da3 e-con-full elementor-hidden-mobile e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="c9f5da3" data-element_type="container">

		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-5a4b770 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="5a4b770" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-23d3cde1 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="23d3cde1" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3b4d038e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="3b4d038e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h5 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">PROVIDING MORE OPPORTUNITIES FOR GEORGIA STUDENTS</h5>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-45f7e8a9 e-con-full elementor-hidden-mobile e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="45f7e8a9" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1f3e2e40 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="1f3e2e40" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-61f1f0cd elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="61f1f0cd" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h6 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">GEORGIA DISTRICT 24</h6>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7cc2114a elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="7cc2114a" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">IMPROVING EDUCATION</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-57560e22 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="57560e22" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>This year, House Republicans strengthened investments in our children’s education, fully funding public schools, providing teacher pay raises, expanding school choice, and enhancing school security. As <strong>Vice-Chair of the Higher Education Dual Enrollment Committee</strong>, I will continue to work to improve this program and provide more opportunities for Georgia students. I believe parents know what is best for their children, and I realize that a one-size-fits-all model does not work. Therefore, I will prioritize school choice.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-e7e4816 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="e7e4816" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-a67dc9c e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="a67dc9c" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2bc232d elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="2bc232d" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img decoding="async" width="2560" height="1709" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-scaled.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5243" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-scaled.jpeg 2560w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-300x200.jpeg 300w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-1024x684.jpeg 1024w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-768x513.jpeg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-1536x1025.jpeg 1536w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-picture-for-issues-page-2048x1367.jpeg 2048w" sizes="(max-width: 2560px) 100vw, 2560px" />															</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-8f48740 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="8f48740" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-e021248 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="e021248" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5edbfa6 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="5edbfa6" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d8cbfe9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="d8cbfe9" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h5 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">RETURNED $1.1b TO GEORGIA TAXPAYERS</h5>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-83e0e84 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="83e0e84" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-688f4c6 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="688f4c6" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3574058 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="3574058" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">REDUCING OUR TAX BURDENS</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f3b79eb elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="f3b79eb" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>This year, the Georgia House returned $1.1 billion to Georgia taxpayers by accelerating the income tax cut from 5.75% to 5.39% and ultimately below 5%. I am proud to have sponsored  HB 717, the Homestead Tax exemption for Forsyth School District’s ad valorem taxes. Look for this referendum on the ballot in November of 2024. I also sponsored a resolution, HR 889, ensuring the delegation&#8217;s commitment to preserving the total senior homestead exemption. The legislature also doubled the homestead exemption from $2,000 to $4,000 and increased the child tax deduction by $1,000.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-62f77f9 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="62f77f9" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-be4521f e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="be4521f" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-66a8d37 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="66a8d37" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1711" height="1992" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protecting-your-privacy.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5225" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protecting-your-privacy.jpg 1711w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protecting-your-privacy-258x300.jpg 258w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protecting-your-privacy-880x1024.jpg 880w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protecting-your-privacy-768x894.jpg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protecting-your-privacy-1319x1536.jpg 1319w" sizes="(max-width: 1711px) 100vw, 1711px" />															</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-71c59d5 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="71c59d5" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-fc8ef5d e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="fc8ef5d" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-cb64c48 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="cb64c48" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-df9a4fd elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="df9a4fd" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h5 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">AUTHORED Central Bank Digital Currency HB 1053</h5>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-0f38c23 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="0f38c23" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-a4b676e e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="a4b676e" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5dd2b3e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="5dd2b3e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">PROTECTING YOUR PRIVACY</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e010c63 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="e010c63" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>I am proud to have authored and had HB 1053 signed into law. This bill will protect Georgians from the federal government&#8217;s overreaching aim to move to a digital currency. This bill will prohibit Georgia’s governmental agencies from accepting payments in a central bank digital currency or from participating in any pilot program.  A central bank digital currency (CBDC) is a cryptocurrency run by the government that replaces the dollars in your bank account and wallet. The Federal Reserve will manage a CBDC, meaning it will become your bank. If the federal government adopts a central bank digital currency, it poses significant privacy and security risks for individuals and businesses in Georgia. A CBDC would give the federal government control over our lives, freedoms, and choices, which is an unacceptable expansion of federal authority. Moreover, it would disrupt the existing financial system and diminish the role of community banks and credit unions. This bill will protect against all of these risks.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-b44e17e e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="b44e17e" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-349de85 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="349de85" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6ba441d elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="6ba441d" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="2560" height="1707" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-scaled.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5180" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-scaled.jpeg 2560w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-300x200.jpeg 300w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-1024x683.jpeg 1024w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-768x512.jpeg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-1536x1024.jpeg 1536w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Seniors-photo-for-issues-page-2048x1365.jpeg 2048w" sizes="(max-width: 2560px) 100vw, 2560px" />															</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-f8f71d4 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="f8f71d4" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-be51d05 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="be51d05" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5369502 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="5369502" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3f7559a elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="3f7559a" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h5 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">HELPED PASS THE SENIOR PROTECTIONS FROM EXPLOITATION AGAINST RETIREES ACT</h5>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-6642a61 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="6642a61" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-8955bda e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="8955bda" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0cf7abc elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="0cf7abc" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">PROTECTING OUR SENIORS</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-656b25c elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="656b25c" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>I collaborated with the Georgia Council on Aging to help pass the Senior Protections from Exploitation Against Retirees Act (SB 84). This act aims to safeguard elderly citizens in Georgia from financial exploitation by providing protective measures. As a result of my contribution to this initiative, I was awarded the &#8220;Legislator of the Year&#8221; by the Georgia Council on Aging. HB 1123, which will create an Elder Justice Coalition for Georgia. This coalition will work towards preventing any abuse, neglect, or exploitation of disabled adults and older persons. This is legislation that I am proud to have sponsored, and I will see this vital bill through to final passage in 2025.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-2095643 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="2095643" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-030a5f0 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="030a5f0" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-80171d4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="80171d4" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="2560" height="1435" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-scaled.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5179" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-scaled.jpeg 2560w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-300x168.jpeg 300w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-1024x574.jpeg 1024w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-768x430.jpeg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-1536x861.jpeg 1536w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Voting-picture-for-issues-page-2048x1148.jpeg 2048w" sizes="(max-width: 2560px) 100vw, 2560px" />															</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-bd08d47 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="bd08d47" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-d0494bd e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="d0494bd" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ec92870 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="ec92870" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-cbbe13e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="cbbe13e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h5 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">ELECTION INTEGRITY BILLS HB 974, HB 1207 &amp; SB 189.</h5>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-2d6ab81 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="2d6ab81" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-5a27177 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="5a27177" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-94a331c elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="94a331c" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">SECURING OUR ELECTIONS</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-640fbb5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="640fbb5" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>This year was a massive year for election integrity bills. HB 974 and 1207, plus SB 189, all tackle issues such as requiring the posting of paper ballots, requiring watermarks on paper ballots, and expanding risk-limiting audits. Georgia GOP Chairman Josh McKoon said, “I would describe this year’s session as a home run for those of us concerned about election integrity.”</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-8d4eaee e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="8d4eaee" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-3655c1b e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="3655c1b" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-aa51f22 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="aa51f22" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="640" height="427" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protection-police.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5323" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protection-police.jpg 640w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/protection-police-300x200.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 640px) 100vw, 640px" />															</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-812d8a3 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="812d8a3" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-25ac4a1 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="25ac4a1" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f41850a elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="f41850a" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-29d38bf elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="29d38bf" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h5 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">PROTECTING OUR CITIZENS</h5>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-c5a7903 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="c5a7903" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-713e313 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="713e313" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ea3e92b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="ea3e92b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">PUBLIC SAFETY</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-8129463 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="8129463" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>House Republicans passed significant pieces of legislation to protect our citizens. HB 19 provided pay raises for law enforcement officers and security grants to make schools safer, giving the Georgia Bureau of Investigation more resources. SB 63, Bail Reform, provides an expanded list of offenses that require bail and ensures that illegal immigrants who commit crimes are not bonded out. HB 1105, Georgia Criminal Alien Track and Report Act prohibits sanctuary cities and requires law enforcement to determine the immigration status of detainees and honor any DHS immigration detainer requests.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-e0bd0c3 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="e0bd0c3" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-647da189 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-child" data-id="647da189" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-3734a351 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="3734a351" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-6a854328 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="6a854328" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-177ef742 elementor-widget__width-auto elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="177ef742" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h6 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Carter Barrett</h6>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-dcdcc17 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="dcdcc17" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Georgia House District 24</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7b8fd6c elementor-align-center elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-5761 elementor-widget-button" data-id="7b8fd6c" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="button.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<div class="elementor-button-wrapper">
					<a class="elementor-button elementor-button-link elementor-size-sm" href="https://secure.winred.com/carter-barrett-for-state-house/home-donate" target="_blank">

									<span class="elementor-button-text">DONATE TODAY</span>

					</a>

				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3eef867d elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="3eef867d" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
																<a href="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24.jpg" data-elementor-open-lightbox="yes" data-elementor-lightbox-title="GeorgiaDistrict24" data-e-action-hash="#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dlightbox%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6NTEzMCwidXJsIjoiaHR0cHM6XC9cL2JhcnJldHRmb3JzdGF0ZWhvdXNlLmNvbVwvd3AtY29udGVudFwvdXBsb2Fkc1wvMjAyNFwvMDdcL0dlb3JnaWFEaXN0cmljdDI0LmpwZyJ9">
							<img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="909" height="1183" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5130" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24.jpg 909w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24-231x300.jpg 231w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24-787x1024.jpg 787w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24-768x999.jpg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaDistrict24-600x781.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 909px) 100vw, 909px" />								</a>

			<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

window.scope_array = [];
								window.backend = 0;
								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");

											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;

											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});

								// Added both `document` and `window` event listeners to address issues where some users faced problems with the `document` event not triggering as expected.
								// Define cachedScript globally to avoid redefining it.

								jQuery.cachedScript = function(url, options) {
									options = jQuery.extend(options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									return jQuery.ajax(options); // Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks
								};

								let uael_particle_loaded = false; //flag to prevent multiple script loads.

								jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
										loadParticleScript();
								});

								jQuery( window ).one( "elementor/frontend/init", () => {
								 	if (!uael_particle_loaded) {
										loadParticleScript();
									}
								});
								
								function loadParticleScript(){
								 	// Use jQuery to check for the presence of the element
									if (jQuery(".uael-particle-yes").length < 1) {
										return;
									}
									
									uael_particle_loaded = true;
									var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
									// Call the cachedScript function
									jQuery.cachedScript(uael_url);
								}

		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-924c9d4 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="924c9d4" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-876274d e-grid-align-right e-grid-align-mobile-center elementor-shape-rounded elementor-grid-0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-social-icons" data-id="876274d" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="social-icons.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-social-icons-wrapper elementor-grid" role="list">
							<span class="elementor-grid-item" role="listitem">
					<a class="elementor-icon elementor-social-icon elementor-social-icon-facebook elementor-repeater-item-e4b7498" href="https://www.facebook.com/BarrettforHouse/" target="_blank">
						<span class="elementor-screen-only">Facebook</span>
						<i class="fab fa-facebook"></i>					</a>
				</span>
							<span class="elementor-grid-item" role="listitem">

					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-a693dcb e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="a693dcb" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
