				<div data-elementor-type="wp-page" data-elementor-id="4963" class="elementor elementor-4963" data-elementor-post-type="page">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-de5a177 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="de5a177" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1c2879c e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="1c2879c" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e857c12 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="e857c12" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;zoomInLeft&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h1 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Meet Carter Barrett</h1>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-83e05fd e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="83e05fd" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;gradient&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-6b281b4 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="6b281b4" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-9952f69 elementor-widget__width-auto elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="9952f69" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h6 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Georgia State House District 24</h6>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c8723e2 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="c8723e2" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">A Proud Georgian</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f534e74 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="f534e74" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;zoomIn&quot;}" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>Carter Barrett is a native Georgian, a proud University of Georgia graduate, and a proven business and community leader in Forsyth County.</p><p>In 2006, Carter started Community Business Bank. Focusing on business fundamentals and conservative economic principles, he kept the bank profitable through the Great Recession before selling it in 2015. He’s since become North Atlanta Market President for Affinity Bank and is a founding member of Dime Capital.</p><p>Carter has served his community and Forsyth County on numerous boards and organizations for over 30 years — including Sawnee Community Center, Northside Hospital Foundation, United Way of Forsyth County, GNFCC, Forsyth County Chamber, The Place of Forsyth, Peachtree Parkway Improvement District and Pups with a Purpose.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c3321fd elementor-align-center elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-5761 elementor-widget-button" data-id="c3321fd" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="button.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<div class="elementor-button-wrapper">
					<a class="elementor-button elementor-button-link elementor-size-sm" href="https://secure.winred.com/carter-barrett-for-state-house/home-donate" target="_blank">
						<span class="elementor-button-content-wrapper">
									<span class="elementor-button-text">DONATE TODAY</span>
					</span>
					</a>
				</div>
								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-e021d1b e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="e021d1b" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-9f54c1b elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="9f54c1b" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img decoding="async" src="../wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Carter-UGA-football-field-qsl42bxx14v2heu9s59c271rfagww7ouvf3iq3slts.jpg" title="Carter UGA football field" alt="Carter UGA football field" loading="lazy" />															</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-117f662 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="117f662" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;gradient&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-c9a6692 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="c9a6692" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e56a21e elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="e56a21e" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">"Man of Forsyth"</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-191cd7f elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="191cd7f" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;zoomIn&quot;}" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>He is a graduate of Leadership Forsyth and Leadership North Fulton, a founding member and Past President of the Rotary Club of Lanier Forsyth, and Co-chair of Envision 2030. The Forsyth County News has recognized him as a “Man of Forsyth,” and he has received the Chamber Chairman’s Award twice and the Paramount Achievement Award.</p><p>The Georgia House of Representatives has also recognized Carter for his contributions and service to Forsyth County.</p><p>Carter and Jamie live in Cumming, GA, where their daughters graduated from West Forsyth High School. They attend North Point Community Church.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6d6be5e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="6d6be5e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">“Keeping Forsyth a great place to live, work, and raise a family.”</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-2d4b77a e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="2d4b77a" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-990dfca elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="990dfca" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img decoding="async" width="768" height="1024" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Cute-photo-with-wife-and-elephant-768x1024.jpg" class="attachment-medium_large size-medium_large wp-image-5257" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Cute-photo-with-wife-and-elephant-768x1024.jpg 768w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Cute-photo-with-wife-and-elephant-225x300.jpg 225w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Cute-photo-with-wife-and-elephant-1152x1536.jpg 1152w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Cute-photo-with-wife-and-elephant-1536x2048.jpg 1536w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Cute-photo-with-wife-and-elephant-scaled.jpg 1920w" sizes="(max-width: 768px) 100vw, 768px" />															</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-7b539ad e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="7b539ad" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;gradient&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-e9ae64c e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="e9ae64c" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7416038 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-5095 elementor-widget-heading" data-id="7416038" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">34 years of unwavering dedication to public service, committed to supporting Forsyth.</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0463a15 elementor-icon-list--layout-traditional elementor-list-item-link-full_width elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-5092 elementor-widget-icon-list" data-id="0463a15" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="icon-list.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<ul class="elementor-icon-list-items">
							<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Founder and CEO of Community Business Bank</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">President of Rotary Club Lanier Forsyth</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Co-chairman of Envision 2030- year long community vision project in 2006</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Helped start South Forsyth Community Improvement District</span>
									</li>

									</li>

											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">

									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">

			<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");
										}else{
											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;

											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});

								// Added both `document` and `window` event listeners to address issues where some users faced problems with the `document` event not triggering as expected.
								// Define cachedScript globally to avoid redefining it.

								jQuery.cachedScript = function(url, options) {
									options = jQuery.extend(options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									return jQuery.ajax(options); // Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks
								};

								let uael_particle_loaded = false; //flag to prevent multiple script loads.

								jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
										loadParticleScript();
								});

								jQuery( window ).one( "elementor/frontend/init", () => {
								 	if (!uael_particle_loaded) {
										loadParticleScript();
									}
								});
								
								function loadParticleScript(){
								 	// Use jQuery to check for the presence of the element
									if (jQuery(".uael-particle-yes").length < 1) {
										return;
									}
									
									uael_particle_loaded = true;
									var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
									// Call the cachedScript function
									jQuery.cachedScript(uael_url);
								}
</script>

					<h1 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Recognitions and Endorsements</h1>				</div>

					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-7714d97f e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="7714d97f" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-37fb4e0a e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-child" data-id="37fb4e0a" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-21fa000 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="21fa000" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Demonstrated Conservative Legislator with the recognition and endorsements to prove it!</h2>				</div>

					</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-d0e0fde elementor-hidden-tablet elementor-hidden-mobile e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="d0e0fde" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-4984558 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="4984558" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">

		</div>

				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-8e2dcba e-grid e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="8e2dcba" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-fe00c5a elementor-position-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-image-box" data-id="fe00c5a" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image-box.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-image-box-wrapper"><figure class="elementor-image-box-img"><img decoding="async" width="390" height="640" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Georgia-Legislative-Scorecard-copy.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5563" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Georgia-Legislative-Scorecard-copy.jpeg 390w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Georgia-Legislative-Scorecard-copy-183x300.jpeg 183w" sizes="(max-width: 390px) 100vw, 390px" /></figure><div class="elementor-image-box-content"><h3 class="elementor-image-box-title">Americans For Prosperity </h3><p class="elementor-image-box-description">I am proud to receive a 100-rated rating from Americans for Prosperity, an organization dedicated to advancing freedom and improving Americans' lives.</p></div></div>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ca95eec elementor-position-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-image-box" data-id="ca95eec" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image-box.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-image-box-wrapper"><figure class="elementor-image-box-img"><img decoding="async" width="540" height="540" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaFaithandFreedomCoalitionRating.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-4905" alt="" srcset="https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaFaithandFreedomCoalitionRating.jpg 540w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaFaithandFreedomCoalitionRating-300x300.jpg 300w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaFaithandFreedomCoalitionRating-150x150.jpg 150w, https://barrettforstatehouse.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/GeorgiaFaithandFreedomCoalitionRating-100x100.jpg 100w" sizes="(max-width: 540px) 100vw, 540px" /></figure><div class="elementor-image-box-content"><h3 class="elementor-image-box-title">Georgia Faith & Freedom Coalition</h3><p class="elementor-image-box-description">I am proud to receive an A+ rating from the Georgia Faith & Freedom Coalition.</p></div></div>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-46690d5 elementor-position-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-image-box" data-id="46690d5" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image-box.default">

					<div class="elementor-image-box-wrapper"><figure class="elementor-image-box-img"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="360" height="364" src="../wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DFF6F579-FBE4-43D7-A736-9ADAC3E6AB40_4_5005_c.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-5694" alt="Police Benevolent Assoc. 			<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

<script id="elementor-frontend-js-after">
window.scope_array = [];
								window.backend = 0;
								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");
										}else{
											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;

											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});

								// Added both `document` and `window` event listeners to address issues where some users faced problems with the `document` event not triggering as expected.
								// Define cachedScript globally to avoid redefining it.

								jQuery.cachedScript = function(url, options) {
									options = jQuery.extend(options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									return jQuery.ajax(options); // Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks
								};

								let uael_particle_loaded = false; //flag to prevent multiple script loads.

								jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
										loadParticleScript();
								});

								jQuery( window ).one( "elementor/frontend/init", () => {
								 	if (!uael_particle_loaded) {
										loadParticleScript();
									}
								});
								
								function loadParticleScript(){
								 	// Use jQuery to check for the presence of the element
									if (jQuery(".uael-particle-yes").length < 1) {
										return;
									}
									
									uael_particle_loaded = true;
									var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
									// Call the cachedScript function
									jQuery.cachedScript(uael_url);
								}

@keyframes ifMenuFadeIn {
	from {
		opacity: 0;
		transform: translate3d(20%, 0, 0);
	}
	to {
		opacity: 1;
		transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
	}
}

.if-menu-peek {
	position: relative;
}

.if-menu-peek a {
	opacity: 0.8;
}

.if-menu-peek::before {
	content: "If Menu peek";
	position: absolute;
	text-align: center;
	top: 50%;
	left: calc(100% + 15px);
	background: #f6f9fc;
	box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(136,152,170,.1), 0 15px 35px 0 rgba(49,49,93,.1), 0 5px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.08);
	border-radius: 4px;
	width: 140px;
	margin-top: -17px;
	padding: 10px 15px;
	font-size: 14px;
	opacity: 0;
	pointer-events: none;
}

.if-menu-peek:hover::before {
	animation: ifMenuFadeIn ease-in-out .2s forwards;
}

.if-menu-peek::after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	width: 20px;
	height: 17px;
	background: url(icon-visibility.svg);
	color: rgb(80,169,47);
	background-size: cover;
	top: -14px;
	right: -15px;
	border-radius: 50%;
}

	<div class="page-content">
				<div data-elementor-type="wp-page" data-elementor-id="4848" class="elementor elementor-4848" data-elementor-post-type="page">
				<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-ccc90a0 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="ccc90a0" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;,&quot;background_motion_fx_motion_fx_mouse&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;,&quot;background_motion_fx_mouseTrack_effect&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;,&quot;background_motion_fx_mouseTrack_speed&quot;:{&quot;unit&quot;:&quot;px&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:&quot;0.2&quot;,&quot;sizes&quot;:[]}}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-596c30a e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="596c30a" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f16ec7e elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="f16ec7e" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">

				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-dde108a elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="dde108a" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">"It is an honor to represent you under the Gold Dome. My top priority will always be to create the best possible future for Forsyth."</div>				</div>

		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-e86cf9a e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="e86cf9a" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-60c3c25 elementor-widget__width-auto elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="60c3c25" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h6 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">A Proven Business and Community leader in Forsyth County</h6>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-377e319 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="377e319" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5891601 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="5891601" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Meet CARTER</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3d1b426 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="3d1b426" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;zoomIn&quot;}" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>Carter Barrett is a native Georgian, a proud University of Georgia graduate, and a proven business and community leader in Forsyth County.</p><p>In 2006, Carter started Community Business Bank. Focusing on business fundamentals and conservative economic principles, he kept the bank profitable through the Great Recession before selling it in 2015.</p><p>Carter has served his community and Forsyth County on numerous boards and organizations for over 30 years — including Sawnee Community Center, Northside Hospital Foundation, United Way of Forsyth County, GNFCC, Forsyth County Chamber, The Place of Forsyth, Peachtree Parkway Improvement District and Pups with a Purpose.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-80b8ed4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-button" data-id="80b8ed4" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="button.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<div class="elementor-button-wrapper">
					<a class="elementor-button elementor-button-link elementor-size-sm" href="https://businessradiox.com/podcast/forsyth-studio/georgia-state-house-rep-carter-barrett-on-foco-talks/" target="_blank">
						<span class="elementor-button-content-wrapper">
									<span class="elementor-button-text">Rep. Carter Barrett on Foco Talks on Radiox</span>
					</span>
					</a>
				</div>
								</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-534bb97b e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="534bb97b" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-12964647 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-child" data-id="12964647" data-element_type="container">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-24a5cc81 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="24a5cc81" data-element_type="container">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-76f93303 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="76f93303" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7c262116 elementor-widget__width-auto elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="7c262116" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h6 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">CARTER BARRETT</h6>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-234952fa elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="234952fa" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Recognized Leader in FORSYTH</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3fc3e29 elementor-widget elementor-widget-video" data-id="3fc3e29" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;video_type&quot;:&quot;hosted&quot;,&quot;show_image_overlay&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;,&quot;image_overlay&quot;:{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/barrettforstatehouse.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2024\/10\/Carter-Long-Video-Thumbnail.jpg&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:5728,&quot;size&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;alt&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;source&quot;:&quot;library&quot;},&quot;lightbox&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;,&quot;autoplay&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;,&quot;play_on_mobile&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;,&quot;controls&quot;:&quot;yes&quot;}" data-widget_type="video.default">

				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-65ca0104 e-con-full elementor-hidden-mobile e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="65ca0104" data-element_type="container">
				</div>
					</div>
				</div>
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-444e388 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="444e388" data-element_type="container" data-settings="{&quot;background_background&quot;:&quot;classic&quot;}">
					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-1612495 e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="1612495" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2f4b5d6 elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="2f4b5d6" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;zoomIn&quot;}" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>He is a graduate of Leadership Forsyth and Leadership North Fulton, a founding member and Past President of the Rotary Club of Lanier Forsyth, and Co-chair of Envision 2030. The Forsyth County News has recognized him as a “Man of Forsyth,” and he has received the Chamber Chairman’s Award twice and the Paramount Achievement Award.</p><p>The Georgia House of Representatives has also recognized Carter for his contributions and service to Forsyth County.</p><p>Carter and Jamie live in Cumming, GA, where their daughters graduated from West Forsyth High School. They attend North Point Community Church.</p>								</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3d8b152 elementor-tablet-align-center elementor-align-left elementor-widget elementor-widget-button" data-id="3d8b152" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="button.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<div class="elementor-button-wrapper">

					</span>
					</a>

					<div class="e-con-inner">
		<div data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-element elementor-element-f5eb94e e-con-full e-flex e-con e-child" data-id="f5eb94e" data-element_type="container">
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a32e71f elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-5095 elementor-widget-heading" data-id="a32e71f" data-element_type="widget" data-settings="{&quot;_animation&quot;:&quot;fadeInUp&quot;}" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">34 years of unwavering dedication to public service, committed to supporting Forsyth.</h2>				</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-53988e3 elementor-icon-list--layout-traditional elementor-list-item-link-full_width elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-5092 elementor-widget-icon-list" data-id="53988e3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="icon-list.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<ul class="elementor-icon-list-items">
							<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Founder and CEO of Community Business Bank</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">President of Rotary Club Lanier Forsyth</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Co-chairman of Envision 2030- year long community vision project in 2006</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Helped start South Forsyth Community Improvement District</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Received the Chairmans Award from the Forsyth Chamber (twice) 1996 & 2006 </span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Helped re-start the Leadership Forsyth program in 1995</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Chairman of the Advisory For UNG Center for Entrepreneurship </span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>
										<span class="elementor-icon-list-text">Recipient of the House of Representatives Resolution for community service in 2019</span>
									</li>
								<li class="elementor-icon-list-item">
											<span class="elementor-icon-list-icon">
							<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-check"></i>						</span>

									</li>

									</li>

									</li>
						</ul>
						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ca73da4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="ca73da4" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p>&#8220;Keeping Forsyth a great place to live, work, and raise a family.&#8221;</p>								</div>

					<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

window.scope_array = [];

								jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
									// Allow user to set any option except for dataType, cache, and url.
									options = jQuery.extend( options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									// Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks.
									return jQuery.ajax( options );
								};
							    jQuery( window ).on( "elementor/frontend/init", function() {
									elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction( "frontend/element_ready/global", function( $scope, $ ){
										if ( "undefined" == typeof $scope ) {
												return;
										}
										if ( $scope.hasClass( "uael-particle-yes" ) ) {
											window.scope_array.push( $scope );
											$scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").addClass("js-is-enabled");

											return;
										}
										if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode() && $scope.find(".uael-particle-wrapper").hasClass("js-is-enabled") && window.backend == 0 ){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;

											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url );
											window.backend = 1;
										}else if(elementorFrontend.isEditMode()){
											var uael_url = uael_particles_script.uael_particles_url;
											jQuery.cachedScript( uael_url ).done(function(){
												var flag = true;
											});
										}
									});
								});

								// Define cachedScript globally to avoid redefining it.

								jQuery.cachedScript = function(url, options) {
									options = jQuery.extend(options || {}, {
										dataType: "script",
										cache: true,
										url: url
									});
									return jQuery.ajax(options); // Return the jqXHR object so we can chain callbacks

								let uael_particle_loaded = false; //flag to prevent multiple script loads.

								jQuery( document ).on( "ready elementor/popup/show", () => {
										loadParticleScript();
								});

								jQuery( window ).one( "elementor/frontend/init", () => {
								 	if (!uael_particle_loaded) {
										loadParticleScript();
									}
								});
								
								function loadParticleScript(){
								 	// Use jQuery to check for the presence of the element
									if (jQuery(".uael-particle-yes").length < 1) {
										return;
									}

									jQuery.cachedScript(uael_url);

	<meta name="description" content="HTTrack is an easy-to-use website mirror utility. It allows you to download a World Wide website from the Internet to a local directory,building recursively all structures, getting html, images, and other files from the server to your computer. Links are rebuiltrelatively so that you can freely browse to the local site (works with any browser). You can mirror several sites together so that you can jump from one toanother. You can, also, update an existing mirror site, or resume an interrupted download. The robot is fully configurable, with an integrated help" />
